content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials + a bonus crochet stitch chart in one printable file without advertisements the lille cabled shoulder bag is a statement piece that combines chunky crochet cables with a modern flair designed with lion brand yarns hue & me this chunky crochet bag exudes warmth and texture there s ample space inside to carry all your essentials making it the perfect accessory for everyday use the crochet top shown is my chantilly crochet summer top 2 purchase the kit here aff 3 lion brand also has a full kit of the lille cabled shoulder bag available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **size** the finished size of the bag shown in the photos is 13 w x 3 5 d x 12 h not including the strap **yarn** i used lion brand yarns hue & me was used for the bag shown in the photos crochet shoulder bag
